headline: Is J. M. Smucker (SJM) Offering Value After Mixed Returns And DCF Upside Indications
summary: If you are wondering whether J. M. Smucker is fairly priced or offering value at current levels, you are not alone, especially with changing sentiment around consumer staples stocks. The share price closed at US$102.08, with returns of 4.2% over the last 30 days, 5.6% year to date, 3.6% over 1 year, 1.8% over 5 years, and a 24.3% decline over 3 years, which gives a mixed picture of recent performance and perceived risk. Recent news coverage around J. M. Smucker has focused on its position...
